summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 CHRYSLER PACIFICA. WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE VEHICLE LUNGED FORWARD WHEN ACCELERATING. THE FAILURE OCCURRED INTERMITTENTLY. THERE WERE NO WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. WEST HERR CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP RAM OF LOCKPORT (6200 S TRANSIT RD, LOCKPORT, NY 14094, (716) 239-4769) DIAGNOSED THE VEHICLE, BUT COULD NOT FIND A FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 20,000.   *TR
